__e: Vous ne penseriez pas que j'en veux, n'est-ce pas ?
You wouldn't think I'd want that, would you?
Vous ne penseriez pas que j'en veux, n'est-ce pas ?
You wouldn't think I'd want that, would you?
Vous ne penseriez pas que c'était drôle si vous étiez divorcé.
You wouldn't think it was funny if you were divorced.
Vous ne penseriez pas que c'était drôle si vous étiez divorcé.
You wouldn't think it was funny if you were divorced.
Vous ne penseriez pas que je suis vraiment bête, n'est-ce pas ?
Do you think I am stupid?
Directeur Xia, vous ne penseriez pas que ce but a quelque chose à voir avec le sauvetage de Wei Zheng ?
Director Xia, you wouldn't think that this goal has something to do with rescuing Wei Zheng?
Ouais, et bien, je savais que vous ne penseriez pas que j'étais sa femme, Vu que vous l'avez déjà mise hors course.
Yeah, well, I knew you didn't think I was the wife seeing as you already ran her off.
Vous ne penseriez pas à épouser un homme comme cela, simplement pour votre propre confort.
You wouldn't think of marrying a man like that, simply to secure your own comfort.

You wouldn't think of it of a couple who settled down in Everwood, but we used to chase the sun around the world.

Quand vous regardez sa signature, vous ne penseriez pas qu'une Personne si gravement blessée peut écrire dans une manière compréhensible, et en dessous elle avait écrit le numéro de téléphone de sa mère.

When you look at her signature, you wouldn't think that such a severely injured person can write in such a... a comprehensible way, you know, and underneath she had written the telephone number of her mother.

Yeah, well, I knew you didn't think I was the wife seeing as you already ran her off.

- May I see your ticket?
Vous penseriez que c'est une blague.
You'd think it was a good joke.

If you knew what it was, you'd think it a curse.

You'd think it was a good joke.

Yes.

If it weren't the truth, you'd think it was a lie!

Yes.

C'est bizarre, car si vous avez des enfants, des petits garçons et des petites filles, jamais vous ne penseriez que c'est un monde d'hommes, car si vous mettez un garçon et une fille de trois ans côte à côte,

The weird thing is, if you have little kids, if you have little boys and little girls, you would never think it would ever be a man's world 'cause if you put a 3-year-old boy next to a 3-year-old girl
J'ai choisi cet endroit parce que j'ai pensé que vous les jeunes vous aimeriez, que vous penseriez que c'est marrant...
I picked this place 'cause I thought you kids might like it, Think it's fun or - You know.
Si vous le saviez et qu'on était encore ensemble, vous penseriez que c'est la tenue la plus cool du monde.
So, if you guys knew that and if we were together, you guys would think it was the coolest outfit in the world.

- But you'd just think I was balmy.

No, I dare not tell you, lest you think me mad.
Vous penseriez que je suis américaine.
You'd think that I'm American.
Juste au cas où vous penseriez que je suis venu exprès.
Just in case you were thinking that I came on purpose.
Vous penseriez que je suis sans coeur si je ne l'étais pas.
You'd think me rather heartless if I didn't.

I was worried that you guys would be disappointed in me and think that I'm pathetic.
Vous penseriez que je divague.
You'd think I wasn't right in the head.

Oh, being bright, I expect you concluded it was me must have told her, meaning maybe I had sold over to her. And with my allegiance now in question,
Je ne sais pas pourquoi vous penseriez que je ferais quelque chose comme ça pour vous.
I don't know why you would think I would do Something like this for you.
J'ai renversé l'eau gratuite sur mon pantalon. J'avais peur de monter sur scène, j'ai cru que vous penseriez que je me suis fait dessus, et notre société doit cesser de s'inquiéter de cela.

I spilled the free water on my pants backstage, and I was nervous to come out, 'cause I thought that you would think that I had peed in my pants, and we need to stop being worried about that as a society.

Mito est entré dans une colère noire, et s'est allié avec Satsuma et Choshu. Ces trois clans ont fait appel à l'Empereur.
